document.full_text: wild fires fed by high winds and severe drought swept through seven high-end homes on the outskirts of amarillo in the texas panhandle on monday, bringing to 12 the number of residences destroyed by fires in the area over memorial day weekend.
document.title: wild fires destroy twelve homes in texas panhandle
lines_and_colors: wild fires fed by high winds and severe drought swept through seven high-end homes on the outskirts of amarillo in the texas panhandle on monday, bringing to 12 the number of residences destroyed by fires in the area over memorial day weekend.
